text:
Trusted | San Francisco, CA Onsite | Full Time | Competitive Salary and Equity Package | Relocation Assistance Available | Will sponsor Visa

- Founding Frontend Engineer (React, Redux, JavaScript ES6/ES7) - Full Stack Engineer (Rails, React, Postgres) - iOS Engineer (Swift)

Trusted's mission is to provide better child care. We are a mobile marketplace that empowers the child care industry through technology. We solve really hard problems each day to ensure that both parents and child care providers can reliably and comfortably user our service.

We are a 2 person engineering team today, so anyone joining us at this stage will have significant impact on our technology and delivering on our vision.

More here: https://angel.co/trusted/jobs

Please feel free to email ai@usetrusted.com (or @ai on Twitter)
